tasks.task: Participating in a web presentation on grazing terminology and definitions.
subtasks: Explaining the concept of mob grazing.
Discussing tall grass grazing and its objectives.
Describing adaptive grazing as a flexible management approach.
Differentiating rotational grazing from continuous grazing.
Describing pastures, paddocks, and grazing cells.
Discussing strip grazing and bale grazing methods.
Explaining flash grazing for riparian areas.
Clarifying terms related to forage growth and residues.
Converting animal feed intake to dry matter.
Understanding the impact of livestock on soil structure.
Recognizing the role of grazers in management.
Evaluating marketing terms in the context of grazing.

tasks.task: Reflecting on the presentation and virtual pasture walk.
